channel.title: How to spawn npc's and make them follow you?

item.title: How to spawn npc's and make them follow you?
item.dc:creator: @Divini Divini
item.description:
@Divini wrote:

Ok Guys, i made a command that makes u summon a npc
but i have one problem
i dont know how to make the npc spawn and then make it follow you
here is the code:

} if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("cat")){ npcId = 3504; sM("Official P3t Of Dark H3ll"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("crab")){ npcId = 3424; sM("You Summon A Crab!"); }

I really would like to know what to do here
This is delta based
thanks

Read full topic
item.source: How to spawn npc's and make them follow you?
